Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街でもこのような事が……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this going to happen to other towns as well...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のところ、他の街は大丈夫みたい。 でもほっておけばきっと……
Entry.EnglishText: They're all safe, for now. But if you don't put a stop to this, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、スールズのように、 元に戻ったところもある……
Entry.EnglishText: There are towns like Sulz that are back to normal, though...

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、それよりも負の感情の 高まり過ぎたところがずっと多いんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, there are many more places where the negative emotions are through the roof!

Entry.JapaneseText: このままだと、 世界そのものが危ない……!!
Entry.EnglishText: If this continues, then the whole world will be at stake!

Entry.JapaneseText: 急いで、ゲオルギアスを 復活させなくては……
Entry.EnglishText: We need to hurry and resurrect Geyorkias...
